articles.title: Why Apple Stock Flopped on Monday
articles.content: The company gets fined for how it operates the App Store.

articles.title: Jamf Stands Out With Strong Value Proposition, Analyst Says After Management Meeting
articles.content:
Mizuho analyst Gregg Moskowitz reiterated a Buy rating on Jamf Holding Corp (NASDAQ: JAMF) with a $28 price target.
Moskowitz recently hosted virtual investor meetings with CEO Dean Hager, CFO Ian Goodkind, and VP of IR Jennifer Gaumond. 
Throughout the discussions, management highlighted its strong value proposition. 
The management indicated that it expects the recent moderation in per-user growth to persist through 1H23 but is hopeful that it can improve after that. 
Meanwhile, management encouragingly noted during the discussion that it expects to achieve its internal QBR onboarding targets by year-end, which the analyst believes should begin to benefit JAMF ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

articles.title: Virtual reality legend John Carmack's departure just made Meta's metaverse gamble even longer
articles.content: The departure of John Carmack, a virtual reality pioneer who joined then-Facebook more than eight years ago, highlights the growing pains of a social-networking giant pivoting hard to the metaverse.

articles.title: Receding share buybacks imperil ‘pillar of support’ for U.S. stock market in 2023
articles.content: Stock buybacks may be peaking, removing ‘a potential pillar of support’ for earnings per share in 2023, according to RBC Capital Markets.

articles.title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Boosts Wear OS Platform With KoruLab Takeover
articles.content: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google acquires KoruLab for its low-power user interface to enhance the battery life of the wearable.

articles.title: Their trash, your treasure. These tossed-out stocks could be your best foot forward for 2023, says strategist
articles.content: So, how to salvage a year that feels like one lump of coal after another? How about harvesting some tax-loss castoffs.

articles.title: Music royalties sing sweet tune to deal makers despite economic headwinds
articles.content: While prices for royalties have come down, digital-music profits continue to grow as stable revenue draws investors.

articles.title: Meta Platforms (META) Increases User Growth to Boost Prospects

articles.title: The Extremely Rare Warren Buffett Investing Strategy Not to Follow
articles.content: Nearly all of Warren Buffett's investing strategies are good to follow. Wouldn't you like to know the one that isn't?
